00007 /*****Function to Initialize PORTS*****/
00008 void init_buzzer()
00009 {
00010  DDRC = DDRC | 0x08;    //Setting PORTC pin3 as outpt
00011  PORTC = 0x00;    //Initialize Values of PORTC to 0.
00012 }
00013 
00014 /***** Buzzer Delay Function*****/

00016 {
00017  unsigned int i;
00018  for(i=0; i<10;i++)
00019  {
00020   _delay_us(100);
00021  }
00022 }

00025 {
00026 
00027 int i=0; 
00028    unsigned char port_C_copy;

00034  buzzer_delay();

00036    port_C_copy = port_C_copy & 0xF7;
00037    PORTC = port_C_copy;
